Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 26 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 16 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 26 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon Turtle makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws.  It can make one Tail attack in place of its two Claw attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Steam Breath, The Dragon Turtle exhales scalding steam in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area takes an Average 52 Fire damage.  Being underwater does not grant resistance against this damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon Turtle can breathe air and water
